items.sentence: May I present this to you in token of my appreciation?
We went early to make certain that we could get seats.
The king ordered that the prisoner should be set free.
The pilot explained to us why the landing was delayed.
Never in my life have I seen such a terrible accident.
We saw an interesting program on television yesterday.
Try to be as polite as you can when asking directions.
Please help me distribute these pamphlets to visitors.
What with the wind and the rain, our walk was spoiled.
The number of students in this class is limited to 15.
Please replace the empty ink cartridge in the printer.
Your joke is funny no matter how many times I hear it.
You can stay here as long as you don't make any noise.
The teacher asked us to clean our classroom every day.
My family moved around quite a bit when I was a child.
Whenever I go to Boston, I stay at my friends' houses.
Why don't you just say that you don't want to do that?
I think that everyone should study a foreign language.
I don't want to be rich. I just don't want to be poor.
Tom needs to be told not to try to do that by himself.
I'd scream very loudly if I saw a scorpion in my room.
I grabbed my little sister's hand and started running.
I wish that Tom would get struck by lightning and die.
You don't need to eat anything that you don't want to.
The only question is whether or not we should do that.
I have a lot of things that I want to do before I die.
The category of a hurricane depends on its wind speed.
Do you think that Tom would care if we didn't do that?
Do you think that Tom would mind if we didn't do that?
I think that it was Tom that I saw getting on the bus.
Tom didn't think that I'd notice that he wasn't there.

Tom started reading self-help books after his divorce.

It'll take Tom longer to do that than it'll take Mary.

That movie was a big hit overseas but was a flop here.
Tom doesn't wash his car as often as Mary washes hers.
This is simple list of exercises to perform every day.

My car broke down on the way home from work yesterday.
As soon as Tom saw the police car, he started running.
Everybody here knows that we won't be able to do that.
We had not gone far before we were caught in a shower.
You're not permitted to bring dogs into this building.
These flowers aren't only beautiful but also fragrant.
